definition: male/staminate/grand/imposing/powerful/mighty/person or state having great power and influence

sentences.english: Prior to the breeding season, adult male pikas moved significantly more frequently above-ground than did females.
sentences.chinese: 繁殖早期，成年雄體地面活動頻率大於成年雌體。

sentences.english: The sexual maturation experiences four stages.
sentences.chinese: 雄體的性成熟一般經歷四個齡期。

sentences.english: No significant differences among food concentrations in the mean density and the production of males were observed.
sentences.chinese: 雄體的平均密度和生產量在各食物濃度下無顯著差異。

sentences.english: Amphioxus the male and female body shape of the same, but different gonad.
sentences.chinese: 文昌魚的雌體與雄體外形相同，但生殖腺不同。
